Text: The video in this file is interlaced. I would recommend the other torrent available on The Piratebay.

Quality is excellent (yes, interlaced, but not a huge deal). Thanks hermes, seeders, for keeping this alive. Also: Fuck you, WBC.

Video: DivX, 704x400 (1.76 AR), 1500 Kbps, 25 Fps
Audio: MP3, Stereo, 128 Kbps (CBR)
Notes: Large resolution (~280 K pixels). 9/10 all-around.
There's a sequel documentary by the same author interviewing some members that left the church. It will be out on BBC on 3rd April 2011
